General.Name: Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes pharmaceutical and cosmetic products in Thailand. It also offers medical equipment and other consumer products. The company sells its products under the Tigerplast, Kangaroo, Tabu, Thermaplast, and Jason brands. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
